task_instructions: template loading is broken for settings without index prefix
synthesized_task_instructions: template loading from files is not working properly for settings that don't have the index prefix, like when i have "settings" : { "number_of_shards" : 12 } instead of "settings" : { "index.number_of_shards" : 12 }, the fix in #4235 only handled some cases but missed this one
